name: Clue Hunter
description:
The detective has met so many cases, the clues are obvious, but which one leads to the truth? Find it out with your own choice.

Clue Hunter is a puzzle game with rich storyline in each level, to experience the full case you'll need to choose all right clues.

Features:
* Free to play, play it anywhere anytime
* Interesting Story, enjoy the clue hunting
* Use your brain to solve the puzzles
* No time limited, enjoy yourself
